thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com | 3 of 5
thread.title: JOHN
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by JOHN

author: JOHN
title: JOHN
text: I reserved one of their new transit vans about three weeks in advance because I needed to move furniture. The day before I was to pick it up I called to confirm and they said the transit wasn't available but I could have a regular van. But those are too short. So I had to go rent a large truck (from someone else) at the last minute and had to pay top dollar. I will not rent from Verc again
